description: This file defines the JsonIPC class which implements the ObjectIPC interface, providing JSON object serialization and deserialization functionalities for inter-process communication. It manages a JSONObject value and supports converting it to and from JSON representations.

classes.name: JsonIPC
classes.description: A class implementing ObjectIPC for handling JSON objects in IPC communication.

methods.name: JsonIPC
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the object with a JSONObject value.

methods.name: toJSON
methods.description: Serializes the internal JSONObject to a JSON representation.

methods.name: fromJSON
methods.description: Deserializes a JSON object to set the internal JSONObject value.
